exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.explanation: Start on your hands and knees. Inhale as you arch your back, and exhale as you round it.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.explanation: Kneel on the floor, sit back on your heels, and stretch your arms forward, lowering your head to the floor.

exercises.name: Neck Stretches
exercises.explanation: Gently tilt your head towards your shoulder and hold. Repeat on the other side.

exercises.name: Shoulder Shrugs
exercises.explanation: Lift your shoulders up towards your ears and then lower them back down.
